name: Thundra's Race for the Championship
description:
The Funky Forest Aerobic Championship! 

Finally, the day for you, Thundra, has arrived to compete among the champions and take the price! No problem for you - if the whole stadium wasn't suddenly taken to the skies.

Thundra's Race for the Championship will challenge you to safe the Aerobics Championship by taking on the role as the famous Aerobic Finalist Thundra and use your Oculus Motion Controllers to run through the environment.

Find out what happened, run after the stadium and save the championship!

This exergame was made over the course of three months as part of my bachelor's thesis. 

The exergame was made with motivational systems in place to keep players motivated to exercise while playing.


Thundra's Race for the Championship is an Exergame for the Oculus Rift and Oculus Rift S in which players take the role of aerobic athlete and championship finalist Thundra, who is on her way to the aerobic championship. However, her opponent Lightning prevents this by stealing the stadium and flying away with it. 

It is now in the player's hands by swinging the motion controllers to follow and stop Lightning.

---------

Key Features

  • Run by swinging your Oculus Motion Controllers!
  • Enjoy a short but fun adventure with a thrilling storyline!
  • Keep track of the distance you ran!
  • Collect Speed Boosts to finish the level as fast as you can!
  • Make your way through a colorful world!

---------

Please note: This game can only be played with a VR Device.

Supported Devices:

  • Oculus Rift 
  • Oculus Rift S

A complete list of third party assets can be found inside the project files as well as the final build.

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Lena Falkenhagen; Nikolas Joshua Klein
